name: Brave Little Birdie
description:
Spread your wings and flap towards adventure! Fly among clouds, shoot malicious birds and avoid being destroyed for as long as you can. Collect as many points as you can and set a score for your friends to beat!

Move your bird with W, A, S, D, or keyboard arrows and shoot with Space.

Original art by Lilya Petrova from https://www.instagram.com/lilyavek/?hl=ru.

Music by Vlad Yudin from https://www.instagram.com/yulaslavdin/?hl=ru.

Enjoy!

P.S.: This game was developed as part of the Unity 2D course on Udemy.com.
